resources.string: 1. First get your 1.1.1.1 app\'s WARP Client ID by navigating to 1.1.1.1 App > Settings > Advanced > Diagnostics and copy the ID under CLIENT CONFIGURATION section (note that you can get that ID only in the mobile app, not in the desktop app)
2. Open this app and paste your WARP Client ID and Click START button as shown in the image
